newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.Africa's Stals says he works closely with Manuel.
newsitem.headline: S.Africa's Stals says he works closely with Manuel.

text.p: South Africa's Reserve Bank Governor Chris Stals said on Tuesday he had a close working relationship with Finance Minister Trevor Manuel.

"In the last few months since Trevor Manuel became (minister) I have been in contact with the minister of finance more regularly than I have ever been in contact with a minister of finance in all my experience at the bank," he told reporters.
Manuel was appointed earlier this year as South Africa's first finance minister from the ruling African National Congress.
